title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 4-6.7 - Access for inspection-water tube type boilers installed after march 31, 1965
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 4-6.7 - Access for inspection-water tube type boilers installed after march 31, 1965

State Regulations
A water tube type boiler shall be installed so that all
drum heads will be accessible for external inspection. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
4-6.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
